JobFullDesc:
Become a Part of the NIKE, Inc. Team

NIKE, Inc. does more than outfit the world's best athletes. It is a place to explore potential, obliterate boundaries and push out the edges of what can be. The company looks for people who can grow, think, dream and create. Its culture thrives by embracing diversity and rewarding imagination. The brand seeks achievers, leaders and visionaries. At Nike, it’s about each person bringing skills and passion to a challenging and constantly evolving game.
Nike is no ordinary company, and we are no ordinary Procurement team. Our Procurement team helps Nike win by leveraging our suppliers and our scale. We partner with our stakeholders to drive value. We challenge the status quo and bring innovative thinking. We use facts to create leverage. We are motivated by results, not by process. And we act as one team across the globe. Our work spans the entire company, giving our team a unique Nike, Inc. viewpoint. Are you a high-energy, self-motivated team player that wants to work for a company driven by innovation and excitement? If yes, we want to get to know you!
 

WHO WE ARE LOOKING FOR

We are looking for a results-oriented Procurement Sourcing Analyst for our Technology & Services Procurement team who is a fast-paced learner. This role work closely with NIKE Sourcing Managers to develop and implement groundbreaking strategic sourcing initiatives covering over $200M in spend across EMEA. The successful candidate will be procuring and managing IT related topics including technology labor, hardware and software services for NIKE EMEA enterprise, DCs, digital and retail marketplaces. There will be a strong emphasis on encouraging NIKE's fast-growing digital businesses. You may also have opportunity to work on sourcing activities related to service-categories of spend, including areas such as consultancy.

WHAT YOU WILL WORK ON


encouraging the team in deploying commodity strategies using the 7-step Strategic Sourcing Process
monitoring, understanding and analysing the category market supply trends and innovations - furthermore you will follow industry organizations in order to maintain awareness of best-practices
simplify and optimizing processes, ensure compliance and drive cost savings across a statement of work (SOW) engagements
partnering with key-stakeholders through the annual budgeting cycle in addressing the impact on their Indirect spend
build and establish key internal business relationships with tech domain leaders 


WHO YOU WILL WORK WITH

Within our NIKE Matrix organization, you will report directly to the EMEA Procurement Sourcing Manager and have strong engagement with Global Procurement counterparts. This role has specific focus on business partnership with our Technology domains which relate to specific region and territories.
